meanings.definition: The act of enrolling or being enrolled.
meanings.sent1: Her enrollment in the art class made her very happy.
meanings.sent2: The school's enrollment increased after offering new courses.
meanings.sent3: His enrollment in the cooking class led to some delicious meals at home.
meanings.sent4: The enrollment of new members brought fresh ideas to the team.
meanings.sent5: The enrollment process was smooth and efficient, thanks to the helpful staff.

meanings.definition: The number of people enrolled in a particular program or institution.
meanings.sent1: The enrollment at the university reached an all-time high this year.
meanings.sent2: The enrollment for the workshop exceeded expectations.
meanings.sent3: The enrollment numbers for the event were through the roof!
meanings.sent4: The enrollment in the fitness class showed a positive trend.
meanings.sent5: The enrollment figures reflected the success of the marketing campaign.
